website_summaries.verdict: Double-sealed silicone mask is comfortable and intuitive enough for new divers but rugged enough for freediving and experienced scuba divers.
pros: Made from top-rated materials all around, including its soft silicone skirt and wide-angle one-piece tempered glass lens
Available in black, black and red, or clear that lets in more light
Convenient buckle makes on-the-fly adjustments quick and easy
cons: Needs to be treated with toothpaste or anti-fog spray
Some customers report leaking around the nose

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mask, but disapponted it comes with NO box!!?
customer_reviews.text: This mask works well and is very comfortable. The skirt does come up a little higher than my other mask, so I have to make sure no hair is in the way. After burning off the residue and using toothpaste to clean as directed, it was very clear and no fogging. BUT, this is the dealbreaker for me -- it came in just a plastic bag. NO BOX AT ALLl!!! Most quality masks would come with a box to protect it. Not this one. Now I have to spend my time and money looking for a box that will fit it. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: HummingbirdsTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dive mask!
customer_reviews.text: As a former military diver, I know mask! I was intrigued after reading reviews of this mask so I decided to try it out. I have an Aqualung Maui thats is popular in the military circles, and this, for me, is better! It fits me a lot better, feels softer, but still solid. Low volume, easy to clear and most importantly no leaks. It also has a great field of view. Also seems easier to keep from fogging after the initial cleaning with tooth paste. I cant believe it keeps up, and seems to surpass my beloved Maui! At this price....a no brainer!
customer_reviews.author: Christi Long

customer_reviews.title: Leaked a bit so I tightened the strap and then they bruised my skull
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully I'll be able to find a strap setting that is tight enough that they don't leak but not so tight that they bruise my skull. On this last snorkeling trip I wasn't able to find such a middle ground. They pressed on my skull between my eyes just above my nose and a week later it' still doesn't feel quite right. Next snorkel mask I think I'll spend a little more to get a purge valve so I can just blow the leaked water out the valve.
customer_reviews.author: Jen K

customer_reviews.title: Great mask.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mask, tried it back to back with a Cressi and this is better, fits nice and super comfortable. If you are looking for a snorkeling mask, buy this one. I ended up returning this and the Cressi though for a less comfortable but lower volume mask. This is a relatively low volume mask, but for my purposes (freediving) every bit of volume counts.
customer_reviews.author: GEC

customer_reviews.title: Fog machine
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to use this mask since I live in Hawaii with some of the best snorkeling in the world. Unfortunately I wasn’t even able to use this mask for more than a minute without it fogging up. I always use plant based dish soap for anti fogger (the best method imo) and it still was unusable. My wal mart and ABC store mask never even fog up when I use dish soap on them. Very disappointed in the purchase because they are very comfortable and seal well.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Had no issues with fogging, although it did leave a somewhat painful impression on my husband’s face. I’m fairness, he may have had it too tight, but he also has a prominent brow and that may have contributed to it as well. Had a little water seepage but he has facial hair so that’s to be expected. Used several time for snorkeling in Belize and view was clear. It was nice to not use ‘rental’ equipment. Used in conjunction with the Kraken snorkel which took a little getting used to but the combo was good.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wilton

customer_reviews.title: Buy these googles
customer_reviews.text: This mask should be priced over $150 easy. It is as good or better then other mask that I own that are over $200. You must treat the lenses, I suggest you burn these lenses with a lighter, look on the web for videos that show how too. The silicone is really high quality and the fit is good.Very comfortable for hours in the water. Wish it did come with a case to keep from getting scratched and dirty but for the price i bought a generic cover.
customer_reviews.author: Pac unlim

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for snorkling
customer_reviews.text: As old time diver I was pleased with the comfortable for and the good visibility. The strap system workers fine. I have mainly used for snorkeling in shallow water so can not comment on scuba dives. Only addition that would be very nice is a purge valve to remove water that seeps in around my beard .
customer_reviews.author: melo drifter

customer_reviews.title: Mask fits well and customer service excellent
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately we were not able to take our February snorkeling trip and give this mask a real test, but the design, fit, and construction appears to be excellent. The customer service and information follow up has been outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Tom-81

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this mask doesn't cut it. I did the toothpaste treatment before taking it on a trip to Florida. It would fog up about 2 minutes in even while using anti-fog. I tossed it back in the bag and used my backup.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing mask for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing mask! I’m an amateur but have done some snorkeling and I loved using this mask. I’m very satisfied with my purchase. I even had someone who would know say “wow that’s a nice mask”. Super comfortable. Not too tight but no water gets in. Doesn’t leave a big mask line either.
customer_reviews.author: tbench

customer_reviews.title: Leaks, uncomfortable, feels cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Tried it in the pool once and it immediately leaked water under the nose piece. Can't even swim a minute without the mask starting to fill up. Very uncomfortable when tightened, the frame dug into my face which was unbearable with any pressure. Cheap mask, feels and looks very cheap. Just taking it out of the package I new it was gonna be defective and I'd have to return it. Unusable!
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: You won’t regret buying this mask. Snorkeled in Hawaii for the first time with this mask. I had no issues with it and clarity and comfort was great. Keep in mind you will need to use some kind of anti fog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mask, hands down.
customer_reviews.text: I've been diving for a loooong time, and for a part of that time I was an instructor, and also work as an underwater camera-operator, so I need my equipment to work AL THE TIME. This mask has to be the most comfortable, best fitting mask I've ever owned. Even with my beard, the silicone skirt seals 99%, rarely get any water leaking into it. I don't feel it on my face, and it doesn't leave me marked up like other masks. Trust me, you won't find a better mask, and the price is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Reynosophotography

customer_reviews.title: not as water tight as i'd like
customer_reviews.text: I like them overall, but they leak water into the mask too much. I do have a stubble beard, so that could also be the issue, but I have to drain the water out every time or two that i go under, even after making them as tight as I can stand.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Dee Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for larger noses.
customer_reviews.text: Have larger nose and tried a few other masks before getting this one. Fit is great, no leakage, soft and easy adjustment. Only downside is silicone turned cloudy after few weeks, not sure if from sun or chlorine or something else, but otherwise love it (bought second one for guest use).
customer_reviews.author: f keith handley

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable, easy to adjust, no fogging with lighter and toothpaste trick
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and good quality silicone, no leaks, even with my thick mustache I only get a bit of water by the nostril and it’s nothing I’m not accustomed to, all my masks do that with my facial hair. This mask is super easy to adjust, and with the lighter and toothpaste trick, I had no fogging in hours of use. No leak no fog, easy to equalize for freediving. Very satisfied with the Kraken mask, would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Albert M.

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to its claims
customer_reviews.text: I've used this mask and the accompanying snorkel twice now to swim laps. Both times it never leaked or steamed up. The adjusters were the easiest I've ever used to fit the straps. It was the matter of only a few seconds and the mask was fitted perfectly. The silicon is also much more comfortable to wear. I noticed after my workout that there were no red marks on my forehead or around my nose, like with my plastic masks. Definitely recommend the Kraken mask as well as the Kraken snorkel, which is more bendable and thus fits better.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Dane

customer_reviews.title: Great mask
customer_reviews.text: This did just fine for my oval face and pointy prominant Italian nose bridge.no leaks. I scrubbed the glass with paste cleaner and a usual scour pad to help get the initial film off and they weren't too foggy even on the first use which I usually expect to be pretty foggy.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable, more comfortable than other masks that I've tried
customer_reviews.text: The product is ok. It is comfortable, more comfortable than other masks that I've tried. However, just like all other masks that I've owned, it leaks water in under my nose and the glass fogs up. It doesn't leak a lot, but it's enough for me to wonder why there is even a nose cover. I have to pull the straps really tight in order to keep the water out. I'm still looking for that mask that doesn't leak at all. I had one when I was a kid, but I can't find anything on the market now that would be a suitable replacement.
customer_reviews.author: H.Jackman

customer_reviews.title: Great beach mask
customer_reviews.text: I just have to say wow after buying cheap stuff from academy. These are amazing. Took my nieces to Pensacola beach and they enjoyed every second of hunting for shells underwater. No leakage and minimal fogging. These are the masks you want for the beach. Bought 2 of them for the trip and will buy more next year when we go again. These are great. Just make sure to rinse well with freshwater after saltwater use.
customer_reviews.author: Mstrstv

customer_reviews.title: Good Mask
customer_reviews.text: This is my first mask, so I have nothing to compare Kraken to. However, the mask does seem to function properly and is comfortable to wear. When I first received the mask I followed the instructions to keep it from fogging up and I haven't had any issues with it. Also, it may be worth noting that I have a pretty thick mustache and only occasionally do I get a little leakage in that area, but nothing that a little air out of the nose won't fix.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, flexible
customer_reviews.text: I may still need to shave the top 1/4" of my mustache, but it seems to seal OK without doing that. Comfortable, flexible, easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Deer HunterTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I use this for a little backup in case someone needs a back up mask to be a part of the group. She fogs and leaks and presses against my face..Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: John Mazza

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: I use it for swimming to keep the water out of my eyes. I find the normal small swimming goggles irritate my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Bararn

customer_reviews.title: Good value well built
customer_reviews.text: Third pair purchased. Love these. Real glass and a perfect fit. Teens use these for scuba diving and for the the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Ron M

customer_reviews.title: Soft rubber
customer_reviews.text: Been using actively for a week now. Rubber is study and seal is great on my face. The adjustment mechanism works well. Overall good value for the money. Haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony D Homer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for snorkeling in Isla Mujeres and this worked awesome. Great quality, very comfortable and no leaking. He has facial hair and the mask still was comfortable with no leaks. Would highly recommend this mask!
customer_reviews.author: Loliver

customer_reviews.title: Won't Seal
customer_reviews.text: Can't get it to seal on my face. I tried everything but it kept flooding. Ended up not being able to snorkel on my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Bgoode

customer_reviews.title: A winner of a mask!
customer_reviews.text: I did follow the included instructions for preparing the mask to prevent fogging. I just used the mask over a week while snorkeling and diving to depths of about 10 feet in the Maroma Beach area of Mexico. I was able to see all sorts of aquatic life. The mask was comfortable, clear, and didn't leak at all. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Hello Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Simply Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely enjoy utilizing this mask! Although, I'm not a diver but am currently using it for "Assessment & Selection" training. I do a lot of donning on/off the mask, mask clearing and calisthenics with it filled, completely abusing the masks intended use; however, this mask holds true! Easy to adjust on the fly with a very comfortable fit and secure seal. Well done Kraken Aquatics!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I decided to replace my mask I have used for many years only because it was getting pretty old. I reviewed this mask and have found it to be what everyone was saying. It is comfortable, seals great, and very affordable. My only advise is to give it a few (at least 4) toothpaste cleanings when you first get it then once before a days snorkeling to prevent fogging. Once it is broken in, clean as needed. Great for freediving.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Got this to go to the Caribbean. It's really a nice mask. Comfortable and easy to use and clean. Very happy. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emersome Angeltoes

customer_reviews.title: Great mask-- and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: I did not initially do the toothpaste trick and had a huge fogging problem on vacation. When I returned, I contacted Kraken and they were extremely helpful. They provided extensive detail about how to remove the coating, as well as tips for preventing fogging. They responded almost instantly to 5 or 6 rounds of email questions and were extremely committed to ensuring that I was successful with the product and happy with the purchase. I tried the mask on another vacation...and no fogging.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dunlop

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Great snorkel! I just took on vacation to the Florida Keys and they worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Grant

customer_reviews.title: Much better than the new full face masks
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and comfort. The lens fogs up when new -- the inside needs to be rubbed with non-abrasive toothpaste, per vendor's instructions, to reduce fogging.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Odyniec

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife!  Ordering more.
customer_reviews.text: Diving in Belize as I leave this review. We have looked for many years to find a mask for my wife that fit well and didn't fog. She loves this mask! Happy wife happy dive trip! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rick  C

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Used these twice on vacation, they leaked both times and fogged up - a lot. Hard to adjust. plastic piece flew off almost immediately when I was adjusting them. Now they’re impossible to size. Junk that wasn’t worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt L

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great mask! My husband and I both got one of these masks for diving. We are both Padi certified and love these masks! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: chad g.

customer_reviews.title: fog up  easily
customer_reviews.text: we even did the toothpaste application,dry and remove and they still fog up very easily. and the straps are hard to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: lesley brar

customer_reviews.title: Great starter mask
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable silicone, and great for the money. It did however, fog up very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Juanes

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this mask it delivers pretty amazing quality. Very comfortable and the straps don’t slip or loosen. Doesn’t fog too bad if you keep them clean. I use them pretty much every day and they have held up great. My one complaint is that they don’t come with a case.
customer_reviews.author: Stone Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mask for my kids and I tried it on myself was very impressed by the comfort for the price. I recently bought a 140.00 mask and I’d dive this over that one any day
customer_reviews.author: Ron Berry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and value
customer_reviews.text: I use the mask to keep water out of my eyes and nose while diving to the bottom of an Olympic depth pool for different activities. It works as designed and feels like a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and does not leak
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these so far (I have ADD and keep losing them!). I just love this mask as it is the most comfortable I have ever used. It's soft around the face and makes snorkling and even doing laps in the pool a joy.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great mask!!
customer_reviews.text: It was an absolute pleasure to dive while wearing this mask. Maybe the most comfortable mask I have worn! I have a goatee an there was absolutely no leaking at all! I prepped the lens with a lighter and toothpaste before I wore them and had no fogging at all!! I would absolutely recommend this dive mask!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: great fit for my head and face.
customer_reviews.text: The Frame or 2 lens masks always hurt the bridge of my nose. These feel great even 50 feet down. Very soft and very water tight.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: I've had better
customer_reviews.text: Not a good deal for face. Glass sits too close to the face and causes water to come in if you make a facial expression under water
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt Earp

customer_reviews.title: Value for your money
customer_reviews.text: I liked the snug fit and very good price. It fogs up less than most but still fogs up after a while. I used it in the Caribbean for snorkeling around St. Martin and Anguilla. I rubbed with tooth paste as recommended but would think that someone could come up with a fog free mask.
customer_reviews.author: Billerica Guy

customer_reviews.title: Kracken dive mask
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father for his vacations and he loves it. The silicone was more flexible than my scuba pro mask, but he said it seals great.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel1978

customer_reviews.title: Well-made
customer_reviews.text: I bought the mask for my father for Christmas, but he hasn’t put it to use yet. So far we can tell the mask is well made! The glass is solid and the mask itself is comfortable yet sturdy. Otherwise, it arrived on time in nice packaging. Can’t wait to try it out! I’ll leave an updated review!
customer_reviews.author: Maria DeGregory

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: My kids begged me for good diving masks, because they were sick of the cheapies...so i read reviews and purchased these. Been using them all summer...hasn't disappointed!! Great product....great quality and material...good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be just what he wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teen-aged grandson to use in our in ground pool. He says that it is a good mask and does everything that he wants it to do. We'll see how they hold up over the rest of the summer. They are comfortable and the lens are very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Mamma

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Only been using them in a pool but I think they would be good for any type of swimming. Had a little trouble with leaking when I first got them. Messaged Kraken on Facebook and had a reply within an hour with lots of great tips on how to fix the issue. Awesome company will definitely buy from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Searcy

customer_reviews.title: It is almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: So much better than goggles! Soft and comfortable against your face! Great vision, keeps the water out, very easy to use and maintain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for a small face
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Kraken scuba mask and a Scubapro mini. The Kraken was far better! The skirt is softer and larger for a better seal. I have a difficult to fit face and it works great! So happy I gave it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice mask
customer_reviews.text: Nice mask. I'm a big guy and food fine. Very soft silicone and good seal
customer_reviews.author: Sky5jump

customer_reviews.title: With this price it’s a no brainer
customer_reviews.text: Let’s just say for the price this is a great value. My son bought a 200.00 mast to go to Mexico on vacation and this mask is comparable. I like that it doesn’t have to be so tight that it leaves a ring around your face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for my mother for mothers day she cant ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mother for mothers day she cant wait to use it the purpose was to keep the water out of her nose she has a swimming pool she does arobics withy sister and swims laps she is 83.
customer_reviews.author: teresa howse

customer_reviews.title: Nice mask
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mask for the price. Sealed on face easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: great fit and barely fog
customer_reviews.text: This product is great it doesn't fog up nearly as much as my other goggles and very comfortable the only thing I noticed is its hard to get on and hurts a tiny bit but it's probably because of how much hair I have but overall a really great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy It!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned more masks than I can count. This is the best one! Stop thinking and buy it. Unmatched comfort and does not fog easily. Clean the inside glass with a little soft scrub and it never fogs.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: He loves it because it is comfortable, easy for him to put on and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 9 year son who stays underwater in our pool most of the summer. He loves it because it is comfortable, easy for him to put on and it keeps the water out.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a great mask. Nice fit and a large viewing frame
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a great mask. Nice fit and a large viewing frame. It does fog since it's new, so I use toothpaste before each use. I have heard you can "burn" out the film, but I'm a little apprehensive about it. Overall, nice mask and good price.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gulden

customer_reviews.title: Manly color.
customer_reviews.text: Great mssk. I bought this for my nephew, the kid goes through the cheap ones like butter. This one met with his picky approval, he loves the colors, told me it was manly. Great price for a mask. His older brother wants one, now.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Neal

customer_reviews.title: Honestly bought this item for a trip to some beautiful water to snorkel and ended up using some provided ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly bought this item for a trip to some beautiful water to snorkel and ended up using some provided by the resort because of the constant leaking into the nose area as well as the visual area as well. I saw this had high reviews and maybe my item is just faulty but overall more of an annoyance using these then it was worth.
customer_reviews.author: RMP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! fits very comfortably and the seal is soft. Will be buying another soon for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I could finally find one that fits and is ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son as he has a larger head and he loves it. All of the stores around have adult size masks, yet they are even too small for me, and I do not have a large head. Glad I could finally find one that fits and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Leaswede

customer_reviews.title: Great mask.
customer_reviews.text: I had a great mask 45 years ago and when I went to buy a good mask I could not find anything but crappy masks. I saw this one on Amazon and bought it. It is a great mask with tempered glass and very easy to adjust. Very good mask. I would buy again, but I think it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, Durable Mask
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Make sure to treat with anti-fogging fluid of some kind before use. Baby shampoo works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit for Bigger Heads
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband - he wears a large hat size, so I was worried about the fit, but he had no problems with this snorkeling on the Na Pali Coast.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An excellent mask! My wife and I go snorkeling often and love these masks.
customer_reviews.author: Abel

customer_reviews.title: Really Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what I need it for. Very good product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Evan Soukas

customer_reviews.title: the mask has worked great for over 2 yrs now
customer_reviews.text: the mask has worked great for over 2 yrs now... but lately I have a lot of fogging... may be just me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lornson

customer_reviews.title: An excellent mask for the price
customer_reviews.text: An excellent mask for the price. As my family of 17 are going to Mexico near Playa Carman for a week, I bought 2 of these mask last week, except for some fogging problem which will clear with a good solution, they are great. I just purchased 2 more for the trip.
customer_reviews.author: terry m.

customer_reviews.title: Good price and great product
customer_reviews.text: I used it for underwater gold mining they work great
customer_reviews.author: Shane Moates

customer_reviews.title: No Leakage!
customer_reviews.text: Fits snugly and comfortably. Nice clear view. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: mmm

customer_reviews.title: The Kraken Dive Mask
customer_reviews.text: An excellent mask. Seals off perfectly with the super soft silicon so there are no leaks. Makes your snorkling experience much better when your not having to drain your mask every 5 minutes! Thankyou Kraken!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mask!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mask for my husband. He loves it! It fits great and stays fog free! It was just what he as looking for! Thank you Kraken Aquatiics for your expert instructions!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: This fit perfectly and are very comfortable. I almost don't even notice I'm wearing them in the water. The clarity under water is outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Rose

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my fathers trip to Hawaii, he is very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable mask
customer_reviews.text: The surround is really soft and is comfortable to wear. The company emailed me tips on care. Will be ordering more for my kids too.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: that is like any mask out there
customer_reviews.text: very quality product for diving. I am a very big freediver and I have been using this mask for a few weeks now and I have not one complaint. the mask does fog up but, that is like any mask out there. So what I did was I got white toothpaste and rubbed it on the inside of the mask on the glass and then washed it out and repeated it 5 times and now I am having no problems. great product don't hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: Patriotsbrotha

customer_reviews.title: Fogged & fogged again
customer_reviews.text: These goggles kept fogging despite the dive masters' various attempts to de-fog with solution, matches, detergent, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seal on mask wasn’t great... cheap build overall. Right for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: v14scar

customer_reviews.title: Great mask, great price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price and quality of this mask, you are getting a tremendous product. I have a mustache and their is a slight leak in that area however, all of the masks that I have ever owned (even the high priced masks) have leaked by my mustache. I like my mustache, the leak is a non issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Super mask!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my!! Love love this mask. So clear, no fogging, and zero pressure. Snorkeling is a whole new experience. Cannot beat this mask/snorkel combo for the price!
customer_reviews.author: kaira resch

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Soft seal. Comfortable. I ordered one and a few weeks later ordered a second! Use in my backyard pool.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Lanigan

customer_reviews.title: fits good
customer_reviews.text: Fits really nicely. It's comfortable and stays on pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Jaycarl

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Totally happy with this mask. It's the first one I have used that does not leave a ring around my face because it is so soft and has an easy seal.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Zambory

customer_reviews.title: Finally a good mask
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality and fits so well you forget your even wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Paratrooper

customer_reviews.title: Nice tight seal
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two pair for 10 year old twins, very soft and flexible, fits their faces perfectly. Nice tight seal, extremely pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anita F.

customer_reviews.title: Just plain “good”
customer_reviews.text: It fogs up quite easily, but it is comfortable. Maybe there is something I could do to remedy the goggles fogging up so easily...? Otherwise, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: xx

customer_reviews.title: great material! soft!
customer_reviews.text: fits perfect on my face. havent used in water yet but the seal is tight and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: itsame

customer_reviews.title: Great mask, seals great
customer_reviews.text: It fits great at Less than a third the price of my previous face mask. Great desl.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Fullerton

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, comfortable silicone. Fits snugly. Lens stays crystal clear. I did not have issues with it fogging at all.
customer_reviews.author: drallim

customer_reviews.title: The goggles offer a nice field of view
customer_reviews.text: The goggles offer a nice field of view. They are of fair quality, I use them for working underwater and tend to go through goggles at a fast rate, so buying the perfect pair, or a custom fit, is not what my goal was. They are a good product for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: jeff prestmo

customer_reviews.title: Great snorkeling mask
customer_reviews.text: Mask fits great. The silicone is very flexible and makes the mask very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: NORTHBOLT

customer_reviews.title: This is a great diving mask
customer_reviews.text: This is a great diving mask. I bought it for minor diving I would be doing while backpacking around an island and it served me very well. I had a few worries initially about the seal on my upper lip because I sport a rather boss beard, but it actually maintained a great seal. I never dived beyond six feet deep, as I was searching for agates, but overall I really appreciated the quality of the goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As an avid free diver this mask is great and doesn’t leak
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

product_meta.title: Kraken Aquatics Snorkel Dive Mask with Silicone Skirt and Strap for Scuba Diving, Snorkeling and Freediving
feature_bullets: Flexible Silicone for Leak-Proof, Comfort Seal: Skirt and strap come in soft, supple silicone, which molds to the shape of your face for comfortable fit and watertight seal. No more leaks or discomfort.
Tempered-Glass Lens for Safety: Forget flimsy plastic lenses! This one is quality tempered glass, which resists scratching and shattering.
Convenient Buckle for Easy Adjustment: Simply pull the straps to desired fit and the buckle will hold the straps securely in place. Presto: customized comfort.
Rugged Enough for Scuba Diving: Thanks to its sturdy construction, your mask can stand up to all kinds of wear - from snorkeling in the pool to deep-sea scuba diving.
One-Piece Lens: A snorkel mask should help you see better, not obstruct part of your view. Now you can enjoy all the underwater scenery clearly.
